WorkItem.Description: Equiping Flickering cowl of the flameblaze (ilvl 378), Rawr shows 248 mastery and 248 hit.  When the actual numbers are 242 mastery and 242 hit.
WorkItem.Summary: Item Stats for Flickering Cowl showing higher numbers then actual

Comments.Message: This problem extends to the heroic version as well, in all random enchantments.

For anyone else running into this problem, if you edit one of the items that has this problem, and click on edit random suffixes, there is a huge list with multiple listings of the same suffixes, just uncheck the wrong ones and try and find the correct ones and check those.
I just double checked and the current list on the server is correct. If you are having trouble make sure you have the latest item listing. I'm closing this otherwise.
